groovyx.gpars.dataflow.impl.DataflowChannelEventListenerManager

  • Packages that use DataflowChannelEventListenerManager 
    Package Description
    groovyx.gpars.dataflow
    This package holds classes for basic dataflow concurrency constructs, like dataflow variables, streams and threads.
